primevc.gui.events.KeyModState

type
class
implements
haxe.Public
subclasses
primevc.gui.events.KeyboardState, primevc.gui.events.MouseState
Base class for UI state messages with key-modifiers.

Static Variables

ALT(inline,null) : Int

CMD(inline,null) : Int

CTRL(inline,null) : Int

SHIFT(inline,null) : Int

Constructor

new(f : Int, t : TargetType)

Instance Variables

flags(default,null) : Int

Uses lowest 4 bits to store KeyModState: 0xF

target(default,null) : TargetType

Target of the event

Instance Methods

inline altKey() : Bool

True when Alt key is pressed

inline cmdKey() : Bool

Flash 9+: True when Ctrl or Cmd key is pressed AIR: Not implemented yet

inline ctrlKey() : Bool

Flash 9+: True when Ctrl or Cmd key is pressed AIR: Not implemented yet

inline shiftKey() : Bool

True when the Shift key is pressed
